title: Provide Product Warranty Information
description: A customer is asking about the warranty for an electronic item they are about to purchase.

tasks.description: Look up the product in the store's information system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate finds the product's detail page.

tasks.description: Navigate to the warranty information section.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system displays the manufacturer's warranty details.

tasks.description: Clearly explain the warranty terms (e.g., '1-year limited warranty') to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer understands the warranty coverage for the product.
